resources.string: With great joy you are invited to celebrate the marriage of
Nimisha Pride, A-01, Plot No - 6,7,10,11, Sector -09, New Panvel
Durvankur Lawns, Behind Raje Shivaji Margdarshan Kendra,Tidke Colony, Bajirao Nagar, Nashik, Maharashtra 422002
Shree Banquet, Sector 1/s, plot no - 113/114, Behind Shabari Hotel, New Panvel - 410206

Hey there, I am Shubhangi Kotkar. I\'m an Engineer by profession and have worked as a Software tester at John Deere for 4 years. My hobbies include reading books, listening to songs and watching movies. I\'m hoping for the best and can\'t wait to see you all at the wedding ceremony.

Hi! My name is Umesh Amrutkar. I am a Pharmacist by profession and I\'m currently working at Cognizant as a Medical Coder. My hobbies include singing, listening to songs, reading books and many more. I love to travel a lot and have done several adventurous things which includes Scuba Diving, Parasailing, River Rafting and River Crossing. So let\'s meet up and enjoy at my Wedding Ceremony.
